entry.note: X/YWorldLimits are properties of an object

message.entry: Masks should have the same world limits (XWorldLimits and YWorldLimits) as the corresponding bigimage at the specified level.
The countEachLabel method is supported only for categorical images. Not all input images are categorical.

entry.note: Expects categorical images to have the same categories

message.entry: Categorical bigimages must all have the same categories specified in the Classes property.
UseParallel requires Parallel Computing Toolbox and a parallel pool.
